attributes.action: Allow Civil/Humanist Celebrants to marry couples.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, there are many celebrants who are conducting funerals, baby naming ceremonies, renewal of wedding vows, etc, but are NOT allowed to marry couples.  A group of celebrants in Scotland were permitted to marry couples recently, so should those celebrants in England/Wales be permitted.  As the law stands at present, it allows only religious ministers or registrars (council) that are permitted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
